meanings.definition: The state of being fourfold or quadruple.
meanings.sent1: The quadruplicities of the clover leaves amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: She counted the quadruplicities of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplicities of ice cream flavors made choosing just one impossible.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as strong as the quadruplicities of a family bond.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplicities of colors in the rainbow painted a beautiful arc in the sky.

meanings.definition: A group or set of four similar things or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The quadruplicities of seasons bring variety to the year.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplicities of tires on the car needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplicities of siblings always made family gatherings lively.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room in quadruplicities.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplicities of flowers in the garden created a stunning display of colors.
